titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Egypt
Egypt

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives and National Library (Dar al-Kutub): Corniche El-Nil, Ramlat Boulaq, Cairo, ZIP Code: 11638, PO Box: NÂ° 8 - Sabttiya

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Foreign researchers may need to gain an affiliation with an Egypt-based academic affiliation that can help with the security clearance required for access to the National Archives. Researchers should contact the Archives well in advance of their visit.
